The class was always very enjoyable. The work was light but consistent which was great since it made me enjoy doing it but I had to do work consistently which meant I was always learning something new. Watching videos in class also made the class very engaging. I only disliked one aspect of the class, which is the lack of central american literature or content. I can say with a high certainty that almost all of the documents that we read were from Spain and none were from central america which is very disrespectful to claim that a course is a Latin American Studies course yet no Central/south american content was covered. This really frustrated me and it felt like a microaggression.
